===============================
BUILD NOTEPAD APPLICATION STEPS
===============================
Notepad App
1. Set Frame
2. Set Icon
3. Set Menubar
4. Set Menu Items
5. Set About class
6. Set Text Area to edit the text
7. Set Event Listeners in Menubar
   new
   save
   open
   print
   exit
   cut
   copy
   paste
   selectAll
   About
8. Set short cut key
9. Look and feel
